languages.text: Из пространственных разломов, разверзшихся вокруг шпиля Опустошительной бури после визита Вольного Торговца, хлынули полчища демонов, и их нашествие устрашило Комморру. Силами кабала Черного сердца вторжение было остановлено, но некоторые архонты узрели в произошедшем слабость их лидера, другие же — мрачное предзнаменование для всего Темного города.

After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.
languages.original_text: Из пространственных разломов, разверзшихся вокруг шпиля Опустошительной бури после визита Вольного Торговца, хлынули полчища демонов, и их нашествие устрашило Комморру. Силами кабала Черного сердца вторжение было остановлено, но некоторые архонты узрели в произошедшем слабость их лидера, другие же — мрачное предзнаменование для всего Темного города.

traits.locale_text: Dimensional rifts that opened around the spire of the Reaving Tempest after the visit of the Rogue Trader flooded the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion scared the Dark City. Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop the incursion. Still, some Archons saw this as a sign of weakness of their leader. Others interpreted this as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

Dimensional rifts that opened around the spire of the Reaving Tempest after the visit of the Rogue Trader flooded the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion scared the Dark City. Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop the incursion. Still, some Archons saw this as a sign of weakness of their leader. Others interpreted this as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

languages.text: 行商浪人的造访打开了狂风阴谋团尖塔周围的次元裂缝，无数恶魔涌入科摩罗的街道。这场入侵让科摩罗胆战心惊。尽管黑心阴谋团想办法结束了这场灾难，但部分执政官将这场事故认为是领导者软弱无能的表现，而其他人则认为这是针对整个黑暗之城的不祥之兆。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的造访打开了狂风阴谋团尖塔周围的次元裂缝，无数恶魔涌入科摩罗的街道。这场入侵让整座黑暗之城胆战心惊。尽管黑心阴谋团想办法结束了这场灾难，但部分执政官将这场事故认为是领导者软弱无能的表现，而其他人则认为这是针对整个黑暗之城的不祥之兆。

languages.text: Nach dem Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} öffneten sich rund um den Turm des plündernden Sturms Dimensionsrisse und die Straßen von Commorragh wurden von Dämonen überrannt. Diese Invasion versetzte Commorragh in Angst und Schrecken. Die Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens konnte sie schließlich abwehren, doch einige Archonten sahen das Ereignis als Zeichen der Schwäche ihrer Führung. Andere deuteten es als düsteres Omen für die gesamten Dunkle Stadt.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} öffneten sich rund um den Turm des plündernden Sturms Dimensionsrisse und die Straßen von Commorragh wurden von Dämonen überrannt. Diese Invasion versetzte die Dunkle Stadt in Angst und Schrecken. Die Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens konnte sie schließlich abwehren, doch einige Archonten sahen das Ereignis als Zeichen der Schwäche ihrer Führung. Andere deuteten es als düsteres Omen für die gesamten Dunkle Stadt.

languages.text: Après la visite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, des failles dimensionnelles s'ouvrirent autour de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse et vomirent des hordes de démons dans les rues de Commorragh. Cette incursion terrifia Commorragh, et même si la Kabale du Cœur Noir parvint à la mettre en échec, certains archontes y virent un signe de la faiblesse de leur chef. D'autres interprétèrent cet événement comme un mauvais présage pour la Cité Crépusculaire tout entière.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Après la visite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, des failles dimensionnelles s'ouvrirent autour de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse et vomirent des hordes de démons dans les rues de Commorragh. Cette incursion terrifia la Cité Crépusculaire, et même si la Kabale du Cœur Noir parvient à la mettre en échec, certains archontes y virent un signe de la faiblesse de leur chef. D'autres interprétèrent cet événement comme un mauvais présage pour la Cité Crépusculaire tout entière.

languages.text: Tras la visita de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se abrieron brechas dimensionales alrededor de la Torre de la Tempestad Asoladora que llenaron las calles de Commorragh de daemons. Esta incursión aterró a Commorragh. La Kábala del Corazón Negro logró detenerla, pero algunos arcontes consideraron el evento la prueba de la debilidad de su líder. Otros lo interpretaron como un oscuro presagio para toda la ciudad.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Tras la visita de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se abrieron brechas dimensionales alrededor de la Aguja de la Tempestad Asoladora que llenaron las calles de Commorragh de daemons. Esta incursión aterró a la Ciudad Siniestra. La Kábala del Corazón Negro logró detenerla, pero algunos arcontes consideraron el evento la prueba de la debilidad de su líder. Otros lo interpretaron como un oscuro presagio para toda la ciudad.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の来訪後、〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔の周辺で次元の亀裂が発生し、コモラフの街角にディーモンが押し寄せた。この襲撃はコモラフを恐怖に陥れた。 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉がこれをなんとか食い止めたが、この件を指導者の弱さのしるしと見るアーコンがいた。あるいは、これを仄暗き都全体の凶兆と受け止める者たちもいた。
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の来訪後、〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔の周辺で次元の亀裂が発生し、コモラフの街角にディーモンが押し寄せた。この襲撃はコモラフを恐怖に陥れた。 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉がこれをなんとか食い止めたが、この件を指導者の弱さのしるしと見るアーコンがいた。あるいは、これを仄暗き都全体の凶兆と受け止める者たちもいた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ziyaretinin ardından Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nin çevresinde boyutsal yarıklar açıldı ve Commorragh sokaklarına iblisler akın etti. Commorragh'ı dehşete düşüren bu istila, Kara Yürek Kabalı tarafından durdurulsa da kimi Arkonlar, bu olayı liderlerinin zayıflığına dair bir işaret olarak gördü. Kimileriyse yaşananları, Kara Şehir için uğursuz bir kehanet olarak yorumladı.
languages.original_text: After the Rogue Trader's visit, dimensional rifts opened around the Spire of the Reaving Tempest, flooding the streets of Commorragh with daemons. This incursion terrified Commorragh. The Kabal of the Black Heart managed to stop it, but some Archons saw the event as a sign of their leader's weakness. Others interpreted it as a grim omen for the entirety of the Dark City.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in ziyaretinin ardından Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nin çevresinde boyutsal yarıklar açıldı ve Commorragh sokaklarına iblisler akın etti. Commorragh'ı dehşete düşüren bu istila, Siyah Yürek Kabalı tarafından durdurulabildi ancak Arkonların bazıları bu olayı, liderlerinin zayıflığına dair bir işaret olarak gördü. Bazılarıysa yaşananları, Kara Şehir'in tamamı için uğursuz bir kehânet olarak yorumladı.
